title: Health Condition notes were recorded
detail: The nurse that triaged the patient recorded notes about the patient's health condition at the time

title: No health condition notes recorded
detail: The nurse that triaged the patient did not record any notes about the patient's health condition at the time

title: Did the patient have to wait some time to see a nurse?
detail: Some patients presenting at the hospital need to wait for a period of time to see a nurse. Did the patient in question, need to wait before they were seen?
help: additional help or links related to the item

title: Information relating to doctor treating the patient
detail: Please record information in relation to the patient being seen by a doctor at the hospital
